scripts.mac:start: concurrently "cd backend && REACT_APP_BOX=API-DEV REACT_APP_BOX_NAME=API-DEV-1 node server.js" "cd client && npm run mac:start"
scripts.win:start: concurrently "cd backend && set REACT_APP_BOX=API-DEV && set REACT_APP_BOX_NAME=API-DEV-1 && node server.js" "cd client && npm run win:start"
